relproducts.title: Words Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

relproducts.title: Seasons Summer Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Bright coloured leaves adorn this white roller blind in a vibrant and vivid pattern. Theres a mix of warm red, burnt orange, sky blue and sunshine yellow that gives this blind its energetic aspect. The leaves seem to swirl and twirl across this blind as if blown by the wind bright coloured leaves adorn this white roller blind in a vibrant and vivid pattern.

relproducts.title: Hygge Birds Summer Berry Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Theres brightness and warmth in every thread of this gorgeous, contemporary and frankly charming hygge birds summer berry roller blind. The dazzling colours are calmed and muted by the soft, creamy fabric, so vibrant it may be but the overall effect is quite neutral. relproducts.title: Summer Trail Essential - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: We love the relaxed pace of life that comes hand in hand with country living, which is probably why summer trail essential caught the eye the moment we saw it. The florals are elegant and enjoyable - two things that we all hope for from their new look interiors. If you want to be able to celebrate the way in which the light enters the living room, you need a roller blind that brings everything together in perfect harmony.

relproducts.title: Tranquil Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
